text:
11. B Given call and put options on the same underlying asset with the same exercise price and
expiration date, a protective put (underlying asset plus a put option) will have the same
payoff as a fiduciary call (call option plus a risk-free bond that will pay the exercise price
on the expiration date) regardless of the underlying asset price on the expiration date.
12. C The put-call-forward parity relationship is:
F(T) / (1 + RFR)" + Po = , + X / (1 + RFR)",
where XI (1 + RFR)" is a risk-free bond that pays the exercise price on the expiration
date, and F,(T) is the forward price of the underlying asset.
